alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 25 at 2:53PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Ward Lake in the Southern Inner Channels. * WHEN...Until 300 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas near Ward Lake including trails, day use areas and campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 252 PM AKST, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in Areas near the Ward Lake recreational area. Minor flooding is ongoing, especially near Ward Lake. Up to 0.2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch is possible. - Areas near the Ward Lake recreational area are the most likely places to experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
